description:
A roomy trunk for your long commute or bike packing tours, made with reclaimed plastics to help reduce waste in our waterways. The roll closure expands or shrinks to perfectly fit the contents, with additional external carry options to clip small items to.Oceanweave® fabric is made with reclaimed fishnets.Water-resistant stiching and a polyurethane coating keep contents dry.Adjustable webbing mounting straps and buckles for a perfect fit.Roll-top and compression straps keep the load nice and tight.Highly reflective 3M accents and rear light loop enhance visibility.

        Sustainability














                      Recycled content
name: Axiom Seymour Oceanweave P7 Seat Pack
